title: Gambling Therapy
description:
A free app providing a collection of tools and information to help you identify and overcome problem gambling.
 
Download the GT app if you feel that any of these things describe you or someone you care about:
 
‚Ä¢ you feel that you are preoccupied with gambling
‚Ä¢ previous attempts to cut or stop gambling have failed
‚Ä¢ you feel the need to increase your bets 
‚Ä¢ you gamble when you feel stressed or upset
‚Ä¢ you gamble to try and win back your losses
‚Ä¢ you attempt to conceal the extent of your gambling
‚Ä¢ you struggling financially because of your gambling
‚Ä¢ your relationships are suffering because of your gambling
 
Problem gambling (sometimes referred to as gambling addiction) is an urge to gamble despite mounting negative consequences. The Gambling Therapy app has been designed to help those that are struggling with problem gambling by providing easy to access information and straightforward tools.
 
Key features of the Gambling Therapy app are:
 
‚Ä¢ self assessment questionnaire
‚Ä¢ text based live support
‚Ä¢ mindfulness and self help exercises
‚Ä¢ crisis support information

title: Bet Blocker
description:
Support can be reached at admin@betblocker.org. Responses will be provided within 48 hours.

Leaving negative reviews without contacting support is actively harmful to others experiencing issues with gambling addiction. As of 19/02/2020 BetBlocker has been downloaded over 10k times. We have 3.8k people (+approx 10/day) actively using the app. Of the 198 reviews we have received, 70 of them are 1 star. Almost without exception those reviews relate to technical issues with the users handset/network that could be resolved by either contacting support, or are only resolveable by contact their network provider. The majority of these users never contacted support even after we responded to them. 

The small proportion of our users who choose to use Play Store reviews to vent have a disproportionately negative impact on BetBlocker's store rating when considered against the THOUSANDS OF PEOPLE USING THE APP WITHOUT ISSUE. Using Play Store reviews in this manner discourages other people experiencing gambling addiction from seeking help. We're happy to receive negative reviews where appropriate, but leaving negative reviews before or instead of contacting support hurts other users. Please ensure you have actually tried to contact support before posting reviews.

--------------------------------------

BetBlocker is a free tool to help you control your gambling. Install it on as many devices as you like and you can block yourself from accessing over 5700 gambling websites. You can select how long you want to be blocked for.

- All users should be aware that once activated the app CANNOT be removed until your exclusion period has been concluded. For testing purposes we would recommend that all users trial BetBlocker in 'Parental Control' mode where it can be disarmed via your chosen password to ensure it does what you need it to do before you activate a 'Gambling Self-Restriction' that locks the device for the selected duration.

- If you experience a technical issue please contact support either through the app, via the contact us form on our site or by emailing admin@betblocker.org. Remember to include your email address or we will not be able to respond to you.

- Users should be aware that our support sevice will NOT help you remove the app. If there is a technical issue we will look to provide a fix for this issue. We will NOT remove the block while our Development Team works on the issue.

- If you find a url that has not been restricted that should be restricted please use the in app 'Suggest a website to block' feature or contact us on admin@betblocker.org. When we add a site to the restricted list it will take 24 hours to reflect at the user's end and you will need to restart your device.

Please keep in mind when contacting support that BetBlocker is a charity staffed by volunteers. 

Users should also be aware that we will not disarm the app because "someone else installed this on my device" or because you tell us you are "selling my device". We have no reliable method of proving either of these claims and we have to prioritise minimising the risk of exposing a potentially vulnerable individual to gambling again. 

While we understand it can be frustrating waiting for a technical issue to be resolved or where we refuse to disarm the app at your request, many of our users have significant addictive tendencies connected with gambling. Where you activate a Gambling Self-Restriction you are making a statement that you do not want to be allowed the choice to remove this restriction before the selected restriction period has concluded. You agree to this in our terms of service.

We will only ever disarm the app as a last possible resort, where we have fully researched your issue and concluded that we will not be able to offer a fix.


This app uses the Device Administrator permission. Activating this admin app will allow to BetBlocker to perform to following operations: 

1. Activate this device admin app
2. Cancel
3. Uninstall app
summary: BetBlocker is a charity providing a free tool to help you control your gambling.
recentChanges: Improve app speed(services)

title: Gambling Addiction Therapy - Get Professional Help
description:
Our online therapists are here to offer you all the help, support and professional tools you'll need to conquer your gambling addiction. We are here for you in those key moments when confronted with the impulse to engage in gambling in spite of being aware of the negative effects gambling has on your life.
	
We offer you nothing less than the best and most compassionate, caring therapists that will accompany you in every step of the way, and provide you with workable tools and boundless encouragement to battle your addiction.
	
The Gambling Addiction therapy app is designed in a way that provides each individual with the most precise therapy along with a comprehensive toolkit of advanced counseling techniques: 

‚Ä¢	Match with your therapist by a personalized questionnaire
‚Ä¢	Leave a message to your therapist at all hours
‚Ä¢	Receive assistance anytime and from anywhere
‚Ä¢	Choose you preferred method of communication
‚Ä¢	Online community support for those who desire
‚Ä¢	Extended education center free for all app users

Being accompanied by an online therapist has been proven to make a world of difference when coping with gambling rehab. When it comes to gambling treatment, over 94% of users are reporting significant progress and over 92% stated they prefer the online therapy method over a therapist's office.

Who we are and what we do
The Gambling Addiction therapy site is a collaborative effort by fully qualified and educated therapists specializing in gambling addiction - to provide 24/7 support to anyone who seeks it.
Following official guidelines similar to those of gamblers anonymous, we offer completely discreet online therapy conducted through secure means of communication via phone, text chat etc. 

Recognizing the symptoms of a gambling problem
The emotion behind compulsive gambling, as described and articulated by many addicted gamblers, is that of being preoccupied with the need to engage in this action, often triggered by feelings of stress or distress.
This behavior pattern is inevitably followed by the need for winning back gambling losses and increasing bet amounts - resulting in gambling substantial debt.

In other words, the effort to quit gambling is overcome by a stronger impulse realized as part of a gambling disorder, impacting one's life both financially as well as having an effect on personal relationships.

Education center - understanding the gambler‚Äôs psyche

o	Learn all about the symptoms and rationality of pathological gambling
o	Recognize the patterns that drive the addicted gambler behavior
o	Get to know subtleties such as betting vs. gambling

With the Gambling Addiction Therapy site you're in the best of hands. Install the Gambling Addiction Therapy app and start gaining the confidence needed to face and defeat your gambling addiction!
summary: Gambling Addiction Therapy ‚Äì gain confidence to face and beat gambling addiction
recentChanges:
- Addiction is an illness; therapy is the treatment
- Chat with experts who have experience with your condition
- Significantly cheaper than office therapy

title: Gambling Addiction, how to stop gambling
description:
Learn tools to cope with your addiction to gambling.

** Download Today and learn the following.

*Learn what gambling addiction is.
*Learn ways to stop gambling.
*Understand the myths about gambling and the consequences. 
*Understand the negative side effects on you and your family.
*Test yourself, read the self-test to see if you have a problem with gambling.

What is Gambling?

Gambling addiction is an urge to gamble continuously despite harmful negative consequences or a desire to stop. Problem gambling is often defined by whether harm is experienced by the gambler or others, rather than by the gambler's behaviour.

Severe problem gambling may be diagnosed as clinical pathological gambling if the gambler meets certain criteria. Pathological gambling is a common disorder that is associated with both social and family costs.

Individuals suffering from compulsive gambling, are novelty seekers, feel disconnected (dissociated), relaxed, or aroused while gambling. 

Research shows individuals who have money problems, win large amounts of money early into gambling, suffer rec losses like divorce, job losses are at an increased risk of developing compulsive gambling.

Symptoms of a gambling addiction may include:
1. A preoccupation with gambling and loss of interest in other hobbies.
2. Increasing the quantities gambled to recoup lost bets or to experience the same thrill.
3. A negative impact upon relationships with those closest to you.
4. Concealing the amount of money and time spent betting from family members.
5. Stealing money in order to gamble.
6. Denial that you have a problem.
In addition to these, you may also suffer from physical symptoms. These symptoms may include anxiety,
irritability, headaches, stomach aches and stress-related symptoms
summary: Gambling Addiction, tools to cope each day and beat your addiction

title: Iowa Gambling Game: Decision Making With Cards
description:
Think you can be in the elite 5% and solve the classic Iowa Gambling Game?! üèÜ Find out with this latest take on a classic psychology experiment. 

Based on a famous psychology experiment called Iowa gambling task, Iowa Gambling Game is designed to help players with decision making using a simulated card game. üé¥ It is commonly used to research brain activity in people through the analysis of cognition and emotional responses.ü§î It involves taking risks that result in rewards or penalties, just like many life decisions we make on a daily basis.

Here are the rules of the game:
‚û°Ô∏èThe player draws cards from each deck until he or she draws 100 cards. üíØ
‚û°Ô∏èEach card allows you to win or lose money. ü§ëüí∞üí≤
‚û°Ô∏èThere is a scorekeeper at the bottom of the screen to keep track of the scores
‚û°Ô∏èAfter the player has drawn 100 cards, the user needs to select which 2 decks have the most wins and are considered the best decks. 
‚û°Ô∏èThe best decks vary between each game. 
‚û°Ô∏èThe rules can also be viewed by tapping on the blue question mark icon. 

If you enjoy strategy games like Yahtzee or Solitaire, then you will enjoy this game.

This is a solo game but feel free to share it with friends who enjoy classic strategy card games.
